title: TGaceAllStories
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ‘We almost lost $10,000’: My late father-in-law’s company claimed his life-insurance policy didn’t exist. It did.
items.description: “The company changed names several times, and it was very difficult tracking them down for payment of benefits.”

items.title: Americans’ happiness is at a record low. Are we just using our money the wrong way?
items.description: Fewer than half of Americans say they are financially secure, but there are indications that it’s not just a lack of money that’s stripping away Ameri...

items.title: ‘There’s a lot of tension’: My brother and I manage a $5 million trust. How do we solve our many disagreements?
items.description: “We have a good estate attorney, but he just repeats the facts; we need someone to help with the feelings.”

items.title: ‘I’ve always lived hand-to-mouth’: I’m 64. My father left me $400K from his 457(b) plan. My brother is suing me. How can I defend myself?
items.description: “I live off my Social Security of $900 a month.”

items.title: ‘My retirement is completely in bitcoin’: Why don’t more people do what I do?
items.description: “‘I also borrow against bitcoin. What’s the catch?”

items.title: Does Berkshire's big tech bet signal a new risk tolerance in Omaha?
items.description: Berkshire Hathaway's purchase of Alphabet shares may signal a new acceptance of greater risk for greater reward.

items.title: Activist Ananym Capital sees upside if Baker Hughes spins off its oilfield services business
items.description: Ananym said it expects a potential separation could result in an about 51% immediate upside through realizing Baker's sum of parts valuation.

items.title: These are the most oversold stocks in the market that are ripe for a near-term bounce
items.description: We used the CNBC Pro stock screener to find stocks that have a 14-day relative strength index (RSI) below 30, leaving them technically oversold.

items.title: Robinhood shares drop 12% this week amid losses in bitcoin, AI stocks
items.description: The platform's core business relies on retail investors pouring into speculative corners of the market, particularly crypto and AI-linked stocks.

items.title: Two retail stocks to buy as the holiday shopping season kicks off next week
items.description: Loop Capital says Best Buy and Five Below will stand strong in a cloudy U.S. economy.
